issue.title: [CF 379] Target is Closer than 10 yards
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Im trying to build a condition that allows me to hide my Shadowflame button if my target is not in range.
(Game sets it at 100y but it won't actually hit unless my target is 10y or less)

I cannot do that at the moment.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

The button is supposed to show up when my target is closer than 10y.
I haven't found any way to make this happen.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

4.7.1


> Posted by CurseForge user Ochropyra | Imported from CurseForge issue #379 | Raw

comments.body:
You need to use a spell range or item range condition and check some other spell with a 10yd range. Blizzard does not support checking if a unit is within X number of yards - you can only check if some spell or item is in range of the unit, and you can also only use spells/items that can be cast/used on that unit (E.g. you cannot check if a hostile target is in range of a bandage, because bandages can only be used on friendly targets.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
